benchmark_details.name: Embodied Planning Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: The dataset consists of 67K instruction instances aimed at enhancing embodied instruction planning for robotic agents. It is specifically designed to improve the logical validity and execution of long-term decisions in instruction following tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance long-term decision making in robotics by integrating LLM capabilities with domain-specific expertise through a high-quality dataset.

data.source: Generated from ALFRED dataset and augmented with self-instruction mechanisms.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on effectively completed tasks and the accuracy of planned subgoals.
methodology.interpretation: Higher metrics indicate improved planning efficiency and task completion.
methodology.baseline_results: Comparison with existing methods like Prompter and LLM-Planner shows significant improvements across different metrics.
methodology.validation: The dataset's efficacy is validated through performance on the ALFRED benchmark.
